title: Sítio do Picapau Amarelo
overview: The stories of Sítio do Picapau Amarelo are set on the farm of Dona Benta, a friendly lady who lives away from the rush and noise of the city. She counts on the friendship of Tia Nastácia, who cooks delicious delicacies for her and her granddaughter Lúcia, better known as Narizinho. Alongside the inseparable doll Emília, Narizinho is a sweet girl full of dreams, who creates a world of fantasies around her.
